name: SRFetchRequest
desc: An object that defines the criteria for a sample query.

items.name: var device: SRDevice
items.desc: The device to query for sample data.

items.name: class SRDevice
items.desc: A representation of a device that provides sample data.

items.name: var from: SRAbsoluteTime
items.desc: Fetches sample information that occurs after this time.

items.name: var to: SRAbsoluteTime
items.desc: Fetches sample information that occurs before this time.

items.name: struct SRAbsoluteTime
items.desc: A value that describes when the system records the data.

items.name: static func fromCFAbsoluteTime(_cf: CFAbsoluteTime) -> SRAbsoluteTime
items.desc: Provides an absolute time equivalent to the argument core-foundation absolute time.

items.name: static func fromContinuousTime(_continuous: UInt64) -> SRAbsoluteTime
items.desc: Provides an absolute time equivalent to the argument continuous time.

items.name: func toCFAbsoluteTime() -> CFAbsoluteTime
items.desc: Converts an absolute time to a core-foundation absolute time.
